cells.data:
Differences in later pyramids (resources shifting away) suggests political or internal issues, or shifting of interests
Pyramid texts begin to really appear in the 5th dynasty
Come from burial chamber
Typically spells and incantations that protect the body and ka
Pyramid is the piece that sits on top of the obelisk, which is important to the Sun cult
Also, pyramid texts refer to ascendance, Ladder, etc.

Greek culture: images of athletes as thanks to deity for the victory (statues)
Egyptian sculptures feel engaged in the stone, &c., whereas typical Greeks statues are in the round
